comments.body: Why not `flutter build` ?  For example `flutter build apk` and `flutter build ios` should build the targets.

True, but `flutter run --release` will also install the app. I could split this instruction into two commands, but `run --release` is simpler.

I'll make it clear that we're building and installing at the same time.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@* `cd $FLUTTER_ROOT/examples/flutter_gallery`
* `flutter upgrade`
* `flutter -d <device name> run --release`

The `flutter run --release` command both builds and installed the Flutter app.
